Honors & Awards

Recognition and achievements throughout my academic journey

Back to Home

XII Standard

2025-26

  • International Rank 24 in OPhO Invitationals 2025
  • International Rank 18 in OPhO Open 2025; Qualified for OPhO Invitationals 2025
  • International Rank 21 in Category A in PhysicsBrawl 2025
  • IOQM 2025 Merit Awardee; qualified to write RMO 2025
  • Gold Medal, IOAA 2025 (World Rank 31)
  • Team shortlisted amongst the top 50 teams in BL4S 2025
  • Selected into the Indian Team for the IOAA 2025
  • Awarded the Best solution to a challenging problem award in both Theory and Data Analysis in the Astronomy OCSC 2025

XI Standard

2024-25

  • Placed 1st in my school in XI Finals
  • International Rank 11 in ISI LIMIT 2025; qualified for the 5-day online camp
  • Silver Medal, NAC 2025
  • All India Rank under 20 in INAO 2025; qualified for Astronomy OCSC 2025
  • All India Rank 32 in Senior category in PLO 2025
  • Cleared USAAAO First Stage; qualified to write the NAC 2025
  • All India Rank under 5 in NSEA 2024 (Delhi NCR region); qualified for INAO 2024
  • International Rank 6 in Category B in PhysicsBrawl 2024
  • IOQM 2024 Merit Awardee; qualified to write RMO 2024
  • Ranked 7th in the Astronomy OCSC 2024

X Standard

2023-24

  • Placed 3rd in my school in CBSE Board Examinations and was honoured with a trophy
  • Cleared INAO 2024; qualified for Astronomy OCSC 2024
  • Cleared NSEA 2023; qualified for INAO 2024
  • International Rank 101 in Category B in PhysicsBrawl 2023
  • IOQM 2023 Merit Awardee; qualified to write RMO 2023

Other Achievements

  • Lichess: Crossed 2000 elo in Rapid Chess
  • HackClub: Attended HackClub's scrapyard event in March 2025, got a T-shirt and a sticker pack
  • Timathon: Placed 5th in the Timathon 2022, a 2-week long coding contest

Scores and Grades

Exam/Test Year Score
CBSE Grade 10 Board Examination 2024 98.0%
CBSE Grade 11 Final Examination 2025 97.0%
November SAT 2025 730 EBRW, 790 Math
October SAT 2025 680 EBRW, 800 Math

Abbreviations

NSEA: National Standard Examination in Astronomy (The first stage of the Indian National Astronomy Olympiad)

INAO: Indian National Astronomy Olympiad (The second stage of the Indian National Astronomy Olympiad)

OCSC: Orientation-cum-Selection Camp for International Olympiads (The final stage of the Indian National Astronomy Olympiad)

IOAA: International Olympiad on Astronomy and Astrophysics

IOQM: Indian Olympiad Qualifier in Mathematics (The first stage of the Indian National Mathematics Olympiad)

RMO: Regional Mathematics Olympiad (The second stage of the Indian National Mathematics Olympiad)

PLO: Panini Linguistics Olympiad (The national Linguistics Olympiad in India)

ISI LIMIT: Indian Statistical Institute's Mathematics Test

OPhO: Online Physics Olympiad

NAC: USA National Astronomy Competition (The national level Astronomy competition in the USA)

USAAAO: USA Astronomy and Astrophysics Olympiad

BL4S: CERN's Beamline for Schools competition
